title.narrative: 1. Improved policy and institutional framework to foster decentralization and promote accountable, transparent and participatory local self-government practices

Output 1.4.: Number of municipalities engaged in Open Government Partnership initiative

title.narrative: 2. Enhanced institutional and human capacities of national and local authorities

description.narrative:
Output 2.1.: National training system operational
